response.original_title: ...And You Will Know Us By The Trail Of Dead - Crossroads Festival 2013
response.overview: March 23, 2013 - Harmonie, Bonn: A legendary American band, unique in its own right, pays a visit to the Rockpalast. The Texan ensemble is constantly searching for connections between different cultures, even mathematical and physical relationships. Their intellectual goal of combining music anthropological research with the means of modern rock music is recognizable even to the casual listener.
response.title: ...And You Will Know Us By The Trail Of Dead - Crossroads Festival 2013
